markdown-image-transfer.openAfterTransfe: The markdown file which has been transfered will be opened automatically
markdown-image-transfer.removeFolder: The folder where image will move to when clean local image folder
markdown-image-transfer.hasBracket: Whether the image path include right bracket
markdown-image-transfer.imageSaveFolder: Local folder which the images will save to, support absolute or relative path. support <filename> and date format<YYYYMMDD> variable (dayjs)
markdown-image-transfer.updateLink: Whether update the picture link in md file(Clean,Download,Upload,Move)
markdown-image-transfer.skipSelectChange: Whether still update picture link when selection/position changed
markdown-image-transfer.remotePath: Which be added at beginning of PicBed path, support <filename> and date format<YYYYMMDD> variable (dayjs)
markdown-image-transfer.downloadTimeout: Timeout seconds for download each image
markdown-image-transfer.uploadTimeout: Timeout seconds for upload each image
markdown-image-transfer.clipboardPath: Clipboard image's path and name, support <filename> and date format<YYYYMMDD> variable (dayjs)
markdown-image-transfer.urlFormatted: Whether escape image URL when insert local image
